languages.text: Пираты убьют вас чтобы вернуть свой бизнес

traits.locale_text: Пираты убьют вас чтобы вернуть свой бизнес

languages.text: "Вали Вольного Торговца! Пустите е{mf|му|й} кровь! Будет знать, как совать нос в чужие дела".

traits.locale_text: "Вали Вольного Торговца! Пустите е{rt_mf|му|й} кровь! Будет знать, как совать нос в чужие дела".

languages.text: "Gut the Rogue Trader! Make {mf|him|her} bleed! That'll teach {mf|him|her} not to meddle in other people's business."
languages.original_text: "Вали Вольного Торговца! Пустите е{mf|му|й} кровь! Будет знать, как совать нос в чужие дела".

traits.locale_text: "Shank the Rogue Trader! Make {rt_mf|him|her} bleed! That will teach {rt_mf|him|her} not to meddle in other people's business."
"Shank the Rogue Trader! Make {rt_mf|him|her} bleed! That will teach {rt_mf|him|her} not to meddle in other people's business."
"Shank the Rogue Trader! Make {rt_mf|him|her} bleed! That will teach {rt_mf|him|her} not to meddle in other people's business."
"Gut the Rogue Trader! Make {mf|him|her} bleed! That'll teach {mf|him|her} not to meddle in other people's business."
"Gut the Rogue Trader! Make {mf|him|her} bleed! That'll teach {mf|him|her} not to meddle in other people's business."

languages.text: "Tötet {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin}! Lasst {mf|ihn|sie} bluten! Das wird {mf|ihn|sie} lehren, sich nicht in anderer Leute Angelegenheiten einzumischen."
languages.original_text: "Gut the Rogue Trader! Make {mf|him|her} bleed! That'll teach {mf|him|her} not to meddle in other people's business."

traits.locale_text: "Tötet {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin}! Lasst {mf|ihn|sie} bluten! Das wird {mf|ihn|sie} lehren, sich nicht in anderer Leute Angelegenheiten einzumischen."

languages.text: « Étripez {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} ! Saignez-{mf|le|la} ! Ça lui apprendra à se mêler des affaires des autres. »
languages.original_text: "Gut the Rogue Trader! Make {mf|him|her} bleed! That'll teach {mf|him|her} not to meddle in other people's business."

traits.locale_text: « Étripez {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} ! Saignez-{mf|le|la} ! Ça lui apprendra à se mêler des affaires des autres. »

languages.text: “活剥了那个行商浪人！把{mf|他|她}弄死！让{mf|他|她}尝尝教训，别再随便插手别人的事情。”
languages.original_text: "Gut the Rogue Trader! Make {mf|him|her} bleed! That'll teach {mf|him|her} not to meddle in other people's business."

traits.locale_text: “活剥了那个行商浪人！把{mf|他|她}弄死！让{mf|他|她}尝尝教训，别再随便插手别人的事情。”

languages.text: «¡Destripad a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente! ¡Haced que sangre! Así aprenderá a no meterse donde no le llaman».
languages.original_text: "Gut the Rogue Trader! Make {mf|him|her} bleed! That'll teach {mf|him|her} not to meddle in other people's business."

traits.locale_text: «¡Destripad a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente! ¡Haced que sangre! Así aprenderá a no meterse donde no le llaman».

languages.text: 「ローグトレーダーを屠れ！血を流させろ！他人の商売に口を挟んではならないことを教えてやる」
languages.original_text: "Gut the Rogue Trader! Make {mf|him|her} bleed! That'll teach {mf|him|her} not to meddle in other people's business."

traits.locale_text: 「ローグトレーダーを屠れ！血を流させろ！他人の商売に口を挟んではならないことを教えてやる」

languages.text: "Hür Tacir'i deşin! Kanını akıtın! Başkalarının işine karışmamayı öğrensin."
languages.original_text: "Gut the Rogue Trader! Make {mf|him|her} bleed! That'll teach {mf|him|her} not to meddle in other people's business."

traits.locale_text: "Hür Tacir'i deşin! Kanını akıtın! Başkalarının işine karışmamayı öğrensin."
